Sentencas: Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 (SDC) nanopowders were synthesized by an acrylamide polymerization process.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 nanopowders using an acrylamide polymerization process

Sentencas: The XRD results showed that SDC powders prepared at 700 degrees C possessed a cubic fluorite structure.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 nanopowders using an acrylamide polymerization process

Sentencas: Transmission electron microscopy (TEM) indicated that the particle sizes of powders were in the range of 10-15 nm.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 nanopowders using an acrylamide polymerization process

Sentencas: A 98.3% of theoretical density was obtained when the SDC pellets were sintered at 1350 degrees C for 5 h, indicating that the powders had good sinterability.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 nanopowders using an acrylamide polymerization process

Sentencas: The conductivity of the sintered SDC ceramics was 0.019 S/cm at 600 degrees C and the activation energy was only 0.697 eV.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 nanopowders using an acrylamide polymerization process

Sentencas: Furthermore, a unit cell was fabricated from the powders and the maximum power density of 0.169 W/cm(2) was achieved at 700 degrees C with humidified hydrogen as the fuel and air as the oxidant.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 nanopowders using an acrylamide polymerization process
